dict.acceptation: 乘客，旅客；行人，过路人；碍手碍脚的人；

sent.orig: Article 14 Any passenger boarding a train shall hold a valid passenger ticket.
sent.trans: 第十四条旅客乘车应当持有效车票。

sent.orig: Passenger and cargo terminals include Baggage-movement and passenger-transit operations.
sent.trans: 客运和货运站包括行李运转机械装置和旅客运输作业。

sent.orig: The carrier shall passenger according to the time and carrier number prescribed on the passenger ticket.
sent.trans: 第二百九十九条承运人应当按照客票载明的时间和班次运输旅客。

sent.orig: The passenger shall board the mode of transportation with a valid passenger ticket.
sent.trans: 第二百九十四条旅客应当持有效客票乘运。

sent.orig: The passenger transport of highways was 518.8 billion passenger-km.
sent.trans: 公路旅客周转量达到5188亿人公里。
